Topic.Title: New Story Posted: Cubes and Ladders - An Office Adventure

Posts.EditableText:
**Welcome to Minimax Inc., a Fortune 1000 Company**

For the past three months, you've been working as a humble tech support agent, helping clients by resolving issues with Minimax products. 

But today will be different. Starting at 9:00 AM, you'll explore the office for clues, mingle with coworkers, and solve a series of puzzles to keep your job while saving the business from impending bankruptcy.

Instructions for play and the front door to adventure are here:
https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/gbx8qr_zjeqmtnirrmdfca/cubes-and-ladders

Note that the artwork for the story was (convincingly) generated by the AI here: https://dream.ai/create

For the past three months, you've been working as a humble tech support agent, helping clients by resolving issues with Minimax products.
